snippet.title: Kristala PC Early Access Chapter II Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Something wicked this way most *definitely* comes:  the second installment in Dark Fantasy ARPG Kristala's Early Access release is clawing its way to Steam on October 22nd. 

Coupled with the unveiling of a new gameplay area featuring the biome for Kristala's necromantic Myrtuna clan, Chapter II boasts a bounty of exciting new features and mechanics. Highlights include a new playable clan and magic specialty (Tandara clan  / Ice Magic), ten new monstrous enemies, the introduction of the Feline Skill leveling tree, and several challenging and fun bosses.

BUT WAIT, THERE'S MORE! With the release of Chapter II's necromancy clan territory so close to Halloween, we're unleashing several spooky-themed in-game collector's items, available to *ALL* players upon release for a limited time.

Battle your way through Ailur's dark Caves and Hallowed Haunts using a satisfying combination of magic, stealth, and parkour. Your goal? Master the the magics of the Sacred Six Kristals as you uncover the source of a terrible curse in hopes of joining ranks with the highly esteemed Raksaka warriors.

As always, frequent patches and updates will be shared via Steam's event announcement system as new fixes and content implementations are pushed to Chapter II of the release.

~     ~     ~     ~     ~

Kristala is a 3D Dark Fantasy ARPG developed using Unreal Engine 5 by women-owned indie games studio, Astral Clocktower Studios.

Available MEOW on Steam! ⬇️⬇️⬇️
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1206410/Kristala/
